game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the thieves' guild.
game.description: Lady Regina's priceless diamond necklace has been stolen by a group of skilled thieves. She requests your assistance in retrieving it, as it holds great sentimental value to her family.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting +5% charm resistance

tasks.objective: Gather information about the thieves' guild hideout.
tasks.description: Speak to local townspeople and gather any rumors or clues regarding the thieves' guild's secret location.
Use stealth and cunning to sneak into the thieves' guild hideout, avoiding detection by guards and traps.
Locate Lady Regina's diamond necklace within the thieves' guild hideout, battling any opponents who stand in your way.
